verbose_text: Transgene integration was evaluated via conventional PCR using primers designed to amplify a portion of the human U6 promoter driving the shRNA (F-GAGGGCCTATTTCCCATGAT; R-GATCCTCGTCCTTTCCACAA), a region from the U6 promoter to the multiple cloning site (U6/MCS) to verify incorporation of the shRNA sequence (F- GAGGGCCTATTTCCCATGAT; R-GGGCGTACTTGGCATATGAT), and a portion of the ZsGreen1 coding sequence (F-CTGCATGTACCACGAGTCCA; R-GTCAGCTTGTGCTGGATGAA).
